website_summaries.verdict: A good starter tank with a solid filter that allows it to create a comfortable home for a small number of fish.
pros: Plastic construction makes it lighter in weight than others
size can handle a couple of fish well
Several colors on the included LED lights
Quiet run on the filter and pump
cons: This tank has a tendency to crack if it's moved while filled with water

customer_reviews.title: terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I found a 6.5" crack in the front.I really wanted this tank, so I researched the tank.The plastic isn't strong enough to hold the pressure.Many people had cracks.I seen it was leaking and I picked it up to take it to the sink, and it split even more.Do not pick up this tank with water in it.The lights are too close to the water,so they last an average of 2 months.The filter is not very good.It sure was pretty, though. :(
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J Stocks

customer_reviews.title: Water Treatment Product Included Was Expired By Several Months - And Therefore Useless
customer_reviews.text: For $37 this was a great little tank!! Not difficult to set up, and looks very nice. My only gripe is that the packets of water treatment stuff...one to be poured in on Day 1 and the other to be added to tank on Day 14... were EXPIRED and had "use by" dates of JANUARY 2018. :( Unfortunately I didn't notice it until I had everything set up. I had to run to local pet store and spend about $14 more to replace it. :( Not cool. Otherwise, neat little tank. Would have been perfect but for expired water treatment product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kat Bell

customer_reviews.title: This is a short-term tank.
customer_reviews.text: So stinking close :-( I've had this tank since June 12, and I'm OBSESSED WITH IT!!!! The aesthetic is amazing; it has been very durable; and the lights are fantastic! Bbbbbuuuuuttttttttt, the filter stopped. I got 90 days out of the product until it pooped out, and that isn't a good investment imo. I can't find contact information for the manufacturer, so I'm really without recourse. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Not really thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Great tank. Easy enough set-up. Mine had a small scuff on the side but it's hardly noticeable. I would prefer if I didn't have to push the button so many times for the white light. All in all, happy with my purchase. *Update/Warning* Don't move your tank when full, it will crack! Mine did:( It isn't leaking though thankfully. The light stopped working, haven't even had this tank for a month! Also, I found the filter flow quite strong for my betta.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: BEST.tank.EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 ADF frogs and 1 female betta living in this tank and they love it! By far my favorite that I have ever owned. I love the filter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great fish tank!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fish tank! My fish outgrew the 3 gallon tank I had them in, so I purchased this 6-1/2 gallon tank. This is a perfect size - not too big, not too small. I was able to decorate it and still have plenty of room for my fish. It is brightly lit, with different colored lights. I admit that it took me some time to figure out the lights, and at first it was a little frustrating. But now that I know how to do it, I am very happy with it. The included filter works well and the filter cartridges are inexpensive. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this about a year and the light went out. I read other reviews on here and saw an email address to contact the company. I emailed them and they mailed me a new light for free and it works perfect! Thank you SO VERY MUCH! It’s hard to find companies who go above and beyond these days! And I just LOVE this aquarium in my room with the color changing lights. My fish actually look happy again! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Lamm

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for here...
customer_reviews.text: The lid doesn't really fit correctly without some force, the light is super dim and makes you cycle through every color to reach white (you also can't use a timer with this light because it has to be manually turned back on), the included internal filter is pretty garbage, it feels like a big plastic tub (like an oversize Tupperware). I definitely would not buy this again but since I already have it I've upgrade the light and the internal filter (because the hang on back ones won't work with the oversize lips on this tank). Its not passable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Colin H

customer_reviews.title: Good tank for the money, but the light in the hood isn’t very good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tank for the money. It displays well, and looks more like a ten-gallon tank, rather than a 6.5 gallon tank. The shape gives a unique look for your tank. My only negative experience is with the hood. Although it is solidly constructed, the light in the hood isn’t very good, and after only five months, mine has stopped working. Additionally, although there are tabs that can be cut out to make room for tubes, etc, it is very difficult to cut those. I’m going to have to get a replacement hood. Otherwise, if you want a very good, affordable tank, I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Ess

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t fit securely, outdated packages.
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. I’m new to having an aquarium and I just set it up today, so I have nothing to compare this to. The lid does not fit securely at all. It doesn’t close in the back but the front fits. I also saw other people complain about the same issue. Not sure how I’m going to fix that. The two packages that came with the tank to mix in on day one and day 14 were both expired, January of 2018. I wish I would’ve gotten a different tank.
customer_reviews.author: Hailee

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy tank will never clear up!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Koller tank. I Love my other 2 tanks, which are a 3 & 3.5 gal. Since the day I got this tank it has been cloudy. I have done several water changes, recleaned everything inside the tank, it has real plants, I’ve purchased ph balance, water clear, etc. I have several Glofish in there and they appear to be fine. I now have a new pump on order to see if that will help. But honestly, I shouldn’t have to go this far. I’ve practically paid for a second tank and this point just to fix this one and it’s not even fixed. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C Gray

customer_reviews.title: Filter Breaks after 3 months???
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with this tank that we bought in March. The 8th to be exact. It’s barely 3 months old and the filter has already died. It was making a loud noise this morning and I opened it and felt it. It’s not filtering the water and it’s super hot! 3 months does not seem normal for something like this to happen??
customer_reviews.author: kresha hendricksen

customer_reviews.title: Great aquarium package
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this package. The tank and pump are well made and represent a very cost effective way to get a small instant setup. One small issue was the tank arrived with quite a few scuffs on it in various places. I spent some time polishing these out with some car polish (and of course then cleaning it thoroughly) before actually filling it - but once that was done everything was crystal clear. The LED lights look great and offer lots of color choices, and the pump is nice and quiet but still seems to provide a good flow rate. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine little tank
customer_reviews.text: I am using my own filter set up in this tank, both an air pump with sponge filter and an internal box filter so I can't speak for the filter it came with. I'm using a very small heater. The lights are a little weak and the switch is wonky but I will tear it out and use a different led light that has an inline switch and a lot more oomph by the time the weather warms up and I can order more plants. I keep one betta, 7 glolights, 3 pygmy corys, 1 kuhli, and 2 mystery snails in it. I test the water often and stay on top of the water changes and it's going well.
customer_reviews.author: beemom

customer_reviews.title: Good, but lights are kind of annoying
customer_reviews.text: The size and shape is great, but I feel that the lighting is a bit too much. The light button has to be pressed five times just to get to the normal "white" light... I'm sure my fish don't care about this though. The filter is good, but the carbon pack it comes with went straight in the trash, I recommend buying a small sponge to put in the filter instead. I also really like the lid, it hinges open and shut and really helps out with evaporation problems.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Find The Code To Make It Smart
customer_reviews.text: It does look nice and using it to hold baby fish before the adults gobble them up. It's a "Smart" tank and was easy to assemble and fill...but the Smart Code was a major problem...the code is on the boxes, but did not work. Husband called the manufacturer for the Correct code which is necessary to use the perks for this particular model, like the LED lights, etc. They actually said the mismatched codes Are a problem and often get calls.
customer_reviews.author: FL Souri

customer_reviews.title: Filter is very weak.
customer_reviews.text: The tank is beautiful. Lights okay. I bought two of these for my 2 male bettas. They are thriving now because I changed out the filters. If the company could improve on the system I would give it 5 stars. This is a great beginners aquarium. I am not a beginner, since I have had an array of tanks over 60 years. I like this one because It is easy to carry (empty H2O/gravel) to the sink for cleaning. I also do a weekly 40% water change. If you purchase be prepared to invest in another filter. I can share which one works well if anyone wants to know. Happy swimming, y'all!
customer_reviews.author: BenK

customer_reviews.title: 9 inch crack ruined a cute design
customer_reviews.text: After less than 12 hours full and running a 9 inch crack appeared on the side and qater began pouring out of the side. So disappointing because the LED light was amazing and the shape was convenient
customer_reviews.author: Hope Minga

customer_reviews.title: A bit over priced.
customer_reviews.text: What I expected. 3 stars because I'm not so sure it was worth 55 bucks, but it was what I needed. And the filter works well, other than it's a bit loud and suction doesn't stick to the tank well at all, but it stays in place well enough. It's more like a $35 tank. I would expect the issues from a $35 plastic fish tank and would have given it 4 stars if the cost reflected the quality. But, hey, it holds water and looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: great aquarium small enough but also large enough for 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: great aquarium small enough but also large enough for 4 5 even 6 small/medium size fish fits well with the top cover that has the aquarium lights attached. its great, price is perfect, you get it with all the parts needed plus interaction. the top cover is a great bonus as water does not evaporate and no calcium sediment gets splashed from aquarium all around as those without top cover. easy to clean shows off very well dg
customer_reviews.author: Aviva

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad starter tank or for your elderly mom/grandma (what I got it for). She loves it and it's perfect for her little space. I especially like the built in lighting that has several pretty color choices. The filter is too small, but I expected that and added a custom undergravel plate and uptake with small air pump and now it's perfect. Don't expect the filter provided to keep the tank water clear... you WILL need a bigger one or to add a ug like I did.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Zwicky

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, THE WORST PUMP
customer_reviews.text: Pump is crap! Keeps, stopping to work, just keeps breaking down constantly. Already one of the fishes is dead! And am just waiting on fishtank to start leaking like some of the reviews mentioned that it happened after a month of having this tank. It is not one piece acrylic fishtank, the bottom is the piece that is glued to upper part of tank, so I can totally see how peopel had this experience. I am so angry now! Just dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I like the size and shape of this. Perfect for my office desk. Price is good. Cons: The filter is garbage. Needed to replace it with something else nearly immediately. The light resets (off) when plugged in. So it can't be put on a timer. So I have to manually turn on/off the light each day. The lights are definitely dimmer today than they were the day I got it 3 months ago. Bottom line: Would I recommend this? Not REALLY. It's okay. Could probably do better if I had the time to look.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This is one very nice tank. Lid fits snug. Love the cutouts. Not crazy bout the filter. Have added a divider, 1/3 & 2/3. Have my Betta in the 1/3 and my community fish in the 2/3. Using the filter that came with in the 1/3 and another filter in the 2/3. Also added a light dimmer. The Hood makes it so nice to get to everything. Great aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Good tank, bad filter.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tank and it’s so pretty, it’s big and the unique shape makes it fun to look at. But 2 days after getting it the filter stopped working. It makes a loud whirring noise and doesn’t move any water. So I ordered a replacement, they sent me a whole new tank and filter and within hours of setting it all up the filter once again! Doesn’t work!! Not sure what the next step is being I don’t want to have a third tank shipped to my house but I also don’t want to buy another filter since it’s so hard to find one that will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle S.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Filter
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had this tank for 24 hours and I am already having issues with the filter. I was so dang happy to get this tank for my Betta and the tank was an anniversary present but at about 5 a.m. I was awoken by the filter making a loud weird noise and though I finally got it to stop it still leaves me very skeptical to be keeping it in the tank with my Betta while I’m at work. Besides the filter, I really love the tank itself
customer_reviews.author: Emily H.

customer_reviews.title: Still looking for a betta tank
customer_reviews.text: Was given a betta and was in the process of setting it up in my son’s room before I realized it had a huge crack and water was pouring out of it, spilling all over the dresser and down the back. I tried to find how to contact the seller but I guess Amazon only makes it available for certain products.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent little tank
customer_reviews.text: The filter is too small and doesn’t keep the tank very clean. You have to change the filter every few days or it would clog up and stop running. I had to put a larger filter in there and it worked just fine. The tank is a great size to sit on a desk, and the color changing light is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica parker

customer_reviews.title: Would have been awesome, but it's short term solution. Filter won't last and can't replace
customer_reviews.text: This tank was awesome at first, but then the filter stopped working properly shortly after. We keep trying to find a filter to replace it but the way the lid is designed we can't find a filter that will work and allow lid to close. It must sit in the tank, except for a small clip on the side to fit, and there aren't filters on the market that accommodate this amount of water that do that. The plain colored light also stopped working after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shape!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new tank, it's much bigger than I thought it would be which was a good think, I keep my 3 blue guarmies in it together. The only thing I would say about this tank is that I wish the hood was easier to get the knock out section removed. Tried cutting it, bending it, nothing worked. I need to be able to feed my heater cord through the lid so it stays flush with the tank. Still trying to figure out a way without destroying the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Weed

customer_reviews.title: Tank is great but wrong size filter
customer_reviews.text: The tank itself is great. I love that the lid has cutaways to accommodate adding a different filter or adding a water heater. The lights are awesome as well. My only issue with the package is the filter that comes with it is too small for this size tank. The filter is for a 1-3 gallon tank while this is a 6.5 gallon tank. If you plan on keeping fish you'll need to purchase a bigger filter or else you'll be changing cartridges every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small fish!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my aggressive fish, who killed all her tank mates. I didn’t want to spend a fortune on a tank for her and didn’t have a spare tank for her. This was a great solution, it was cheap and the perfect size for her since she’s so small. I used a filter I had in my ten gallon tank for a while and saved this filter for my gallon quarantine tank since in my opinion it’s too small for this tank. I never keep anything permanently in a tank less than 5 gallons. So if ur looking for a beta fish, this would work well for that, but a ten gallon is better.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C. Deimund

customer_reviews.title: pump has not been working correctly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this approx 6 months ago for my daughter for her birthday and so far we have lost Four Glow fish the filter has not been actively working clouding the tank we have replace the filters many times and changed the water. though the filter works for around 5 days then screams and does not let the water flow through it no matter if we add water still quits working. Just a sad issue when all that is what your child wanted and the product does not work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Wetterauer

customer_reviews.title: NO ISSUES SO FAR! 1 week, happy fish
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 5 stars because I got what I paid for. I see bad reviews but mine had none of the problems. Filter is quiet. Tank holds fish fine. It came with the initial products I needed to stabilize the water. I guess it depends on how much you pay for it. It's totally worth the $40 I paid. I've had the tank for a week and I put platty fish in the day I got it. I put the "Day 1" ingredients (that came with it) into the water/tank and then put my fish with as much as their existing water as I could reuse in the tank (that was half full with tap water).
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Nice size,  BUT TANK SPLIT AND WATER LEAKED OUT!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking tank, so far its up and running, will review when I get fish on it. EDIT WOKE UP THIS MORNING TO SEE TANK HAD SPLIT AND WATER LEAKING OUT realize now very THIN PLASTIC Glad I caught it or there would of been a very big mess!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great fishy home
customer_reviews.text: Just right for a table top. When decorated and fish added it's so pretty. Came with starter fluids and good directions with 2 wk and 4 wk. additives. Hood light is a little dim during the day but looks great at night.
customer_reviews.author: Joani

customer_reviews.title: Good but missing a piece. Easy cracks.
customer_reviews.text: The aquarium looks like what I ordered but didn’t come in an original box and is missing a piece. The lights work fine. The filter is good at first but is not making a weird sound and I’ve only had it for three days. Update: the aquarium cracked after a light bump against a wooden wall as I was carrying it to another room...this cost too much for it to break this easy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my betta
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an upgrade for my betta. It’s been perfect for him! The filter that came with it works well and isn’t too strong of a current. I did purchase a heater to go with it and was able to add it without trouble. Shortly after I bought it, the light stopped working but the company sent me a new one and it was really easy to replace! Overall I’m very happy with this tank and would recommend it for someone looking for something a little bigger or as a starter tank.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne W.

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice size tank and all
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice size tank and all, but you definitely want to get a different filter for it, because the one it has doesn't clean worth a darn. I've had to do two complete water changes and scrubdowns of the tank within two months, and all I've had in it is a betta and two mystery snails! A different filter is definitely a must.
customer_reviews.author: Juniper

customer_reviews.title: Faulty. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE. Ive had this for less then 40 days. The filter has completely stopped working and the lights are faulty. I am so angry I spent money on this. And my fish now has a bacterial infection due to the faulty filter.
customer_reviews.author: Lezlie McLain

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy tank for beginners
customer_reviews.text: So I've had this aquarium for give or take a month and I love it. the lights give the aquarium and good look and nice touch. the filter that it comes with is ok but if you have another one laying around that's better I suggest using that one because the filter that is included in the box some times makes weird noises and or stops working for a bit, so i have to unplug it for five minutes give or take to make the filter come back on. overall without a doubt, this is a perfect size and low maintains for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Floridasun

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tank. The various LED light options my son loves - he uses it all night as a night light now. Only odd quirk is the lid - not really held in place when you open it - but a ​very minor quirk.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: DId not last more than a few months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fish tank for my guppies. It is a nice size but not well made. About two months later the light stopped working and the company sent me new one to reinstall. Then the filter had also stopped working, luckily I had a spare so I did not need to receive a new one. But about 5 months into having the tank I woke up to a puddle of water around the tank and a crack on the side. The tank is not good quality and I would recommend spending money on a less flimsy tank with better accessories. I gave them two stars because the company did have fast and helpful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, decorative, variety of lighting options
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and design for the price. Beautiful LED lighting. The only drawback is that the LED circuit board is vulnerable to moisture. This is my 2nd AquaView because the previous one had its LED circuit board corroded by moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: Pump/filter is cheap and never worked right from the get go. Tank ended up with lots of green algae buildup. In the trash it goes!
customer_reviews.author: Dreamsayer

customer_reviews.title: About the light
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy with light. Would rather have one with off and on switch with whir light instead of colored lights. Really nice. Would buy again. Love my fish. I have Bo, red man, and joy. Bought joy at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: judy from pennsylvania

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, and it was cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a carnival goldfish, three months later the goldfish is doing fine the tank not so much. The filter is sadly underrated, needs to be changed every two weeks and the led lights in the hood just crapped out today. If you’re someone I don’t like, I highly recommended this tank.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Pavlick

customer_reviews.title: Lights short out.
customer_reviews.text: I like this fish tank for its size and shape. There seems to be a problem with condensation getting into the light and shorting it out. So, after a year, the lights no longer work. If that did not happen I would have given five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob B.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Filter
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the aquarium EXECPT the filter. They sent me a replacement filter after the first once faulty and now I’m having the same issues with this one. Not really sure what to do and definitely frustrated. Update I bought this fish tank in March and the light already stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous seeing not so good stars and ratings but I'm pretty happy with my purchase. It's a great sized tank, easy to clean, nice filter system and great LED lights. I was slightly confused when the lights randomly shut off and when I turned them back on, now they just dont stop rotating colors. But I like it!!! Overall, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stone890

customer_reviews.title: No No! Rethink! FISH KILLER
customer_reviews.text: Killed two fish - cory cats - within 1 hour and almost killed my betta. Luckily I got my beloved betta out in time. He was dying too! Chemicals from the plastic? I washed out in HOT water for 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Bird Design

customer_reviews.title: Filter stinks
customer_reviews.text: This aquarium is cute but the filter is horrible and trying to get a light to stay on one color is near impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Gabalot

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a great attraction to any room and it come's with all you need, except your gravle and decoration's it work's great, and I love the LED lighting. will be buying another one for my bedroom. It's a great value, Nicky
customer_reviews.author: Nyoka

customer_reviews.title: Love the fish tank
customer_reviews.text: Love the fish tank, but the pump and filter are too small. It doesn't keep the tank clean at all
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Tomey

customer_reviews.title: Pump gave out on month 4.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for just over 3 months. The filter pump is no longer working. I change the filters and take good care of my tank. I’m so sad because I think our fish will die before I can purchase a replacement filter or aeration device. This was a gift for my 4 year old son. I do NOT recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Spilker

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces, broken filter, bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: The tank was amazing and I love the light. It has many color and flashing modes. BUT... the filter was missing pieces and will not work. When I tried contacting the number on the manual. I waited for 15 minutes and they never answered. When I tried calling again, it went to voicemail and they never returned my call. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Renn Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you want happy fish
customer_reviews.text: The filter does not create oxygenation for the tank and the heater is mediocre. Do not buy this if you want happy fish. Also, the light at the top don't stay on and are inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Kasen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice aquarium...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice roomy aquarium...my Betta "Gill" and mystery snail "Mr. Bubbles" Love it!! Perfect for a desk top..colorful led lights. See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio'

customer_reviews.title: amazing tank
customer_reviews.text: Great tank!!! Easy to use and good filter. Only comes with one filter change, so buy more now. 2.5 weeks in and Winky is a happy boy
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Great Tank but Terrible Filter
customer_reviews.text: I have a betta fish who used to live in a significantly smaller tank but as soon as he was moved to this one, he absolutely loved it. The container itself is very sturdy. I only use the LED lights on the normal white lights but it does include other colors. However, the filter itself stopped working after 3 months. I received a replacement which then started to stop working after the first week of having it.
customer_reviews.author: Nibbulous

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works great and great value but u will have to get a better filter because this one isnt big enough to power 6.5 gallons and very difficult to find same replacement filters but for the price it's worth it to get the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this tank though
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to buy the replacement filters now, though. They're not in the stores, and if you run them too long, they're disastrous to your tank! LOVE this tank though!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M

customer_reviews.title: Won't last
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in April andi had to upgrade to a bigger filter to keep up with cleaning the water. Now in August the lights have a mind of their own. They turn on randomly or you cannot shut them off or pick a different color. Overall disappointed with the quality of the tank.
customer_reviews.author: BookGirl

customer_reviews.title: Its what I expected, but not great
customer_reviews.text: The tank is exactly what I was expecting, size wise, but the plastic was quite scratched up when it showed up, and the filter came broken. i was planning on upgrading it anyways, but it still came with missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: T.Peck

customer_reviews.title: Nice aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the aquarium. I did change the filter to a HOB. I ordered this tank before I had my shelves. after opening, there's a nice scratch on the side. thats why a 3 rateing
customer_reviews.author: Keith H

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Ordered , received broken. Ordered replacement, received broken. Gave up. Ordered a different tank.
customer_reviews.author: David A. LaRiccia

customer_reviews.title: Its a good tank
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tank my fish love it! Came with alittle crack on the bottom but holds the water just fine. Don't move the tank when full with water you will end up breaking it!
customer_reviews.author: Hello world I am Shan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good for a starter tank!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty little tank only good to put maybe a bata in or a couple little fish! But great for a starter tank! My Grandson Loves feeding his fish! We put a couple colorful fish in his!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fishies can’t breef
customer_reviews.text: The filter that comes with this brand is bad. It doesn’t work well at all. I had to go out and purchase a separate more powerful filter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT SURE
customer_reviews.text: The item I received was cracked and I was not able to set up. I have to return. But from what I seen, I do like the tank. I hope it looks good when I set up.
customer_reviews.author: Georgeann

customer_reviews.title: Cute Tank.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little fish tank. It is currently housing three neon tetras, a snail, and a male betta with two live plants and decorations with plenty of room to spare for swimming. The shape is a bit odd, but it's cute to stick in a corner. The only negative about this tank is the light feature. There are way too many color choices! After 4 months of owning the tank the button for the light has already ripped because I have to press it so many times to get to the white light! Sometimes less is more.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Iuliucci

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to setup. The only thing I would recommend is when you are washing the tank, do not use the scrub side of the sponge. The tank is not scratch resistant. It also does not have a convenient notch for where to place the heating element. I found running it through the same notch as the filter works, but makes the lid rise slightly. Overall would recommend and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: cracked
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and it was cracked along one of the corners. I ordered a replacement and it was also cracked in the same spot. I have had this aquarium for less than 6 months and had to replace the filter and now the light will only stay on for an hour or two and then it shuts itself off. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very Good, we found filter was not working so called ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Good, we found filter was not working so called Amazon they returned the filter cost to buy from anywhere. I would love to recommed this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Kashif equebal

customer_reviews.title: Acrylic tank had a lot of scratches.
customer_reviews.text: It was extremely scratched along the front and sides like it was a return and they used a very abrasive brush. I had already purchased the fish so I needed the tank. Plus the light tends to flicker if it’s slightly wet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ray Murray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble arrived in great condition. Filter is not that noisy. It also changes color with a click of a button. Lid is sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Godinez

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product I've had for 6 months and my fish seem to love it. Its a perfect shape and has a lot of room.It came with a crack on the side but had no leaking issues. I would definitely recommend if u want to have more then 1 fish. Its on the harder side to clean because it is so big. Other then that it is better then what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Lotz

customer_reviews.title: DELIVERED WITH CRACK
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was on time! The tanks size and lights were true to the description but when I looked further I noticed a crack towards the bottom of the tank and I was being extra careful with it because I was aware of the other reviews and complaint of receiving it cracked, maybe I should’ve choose another product...... i need a replacement or refund
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Harris

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for a Betta fish and small community tank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tank..horrible filter
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fish thank..excellent for a small amount of fish.. lights are great... the Filter is horrible...... needed to replace it after 4 weeks...horrible..... and very difficult to get filter to fit this tank..
customer_reviews.author: brian padilla

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my brother, he loves his pets fishes and the filter and lights still work! Recommend this for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Briceno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 3 fish, great size. The filter works well. I like it’s small size and aerator effect.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I love my fish tank.. It is a great size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Medlin

customer_reviews.title: Quiet. Love the lights
customer_reviews.text: The filter stopped working after 3 1/2 weeks. I have emailed filter company. I love the lights. My 5 goldfish love it
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Engle

customer_reviews.title: Got it on sale so far it's working the plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale so far it's working the plastic does creak. The filter is a waterfall filter and makes a lot of noise

customer_reviews.title: Your fish will die.
customer_reviews.text: DONT get this product if you want your fish to electric shock themselves or die. we set up the tank perfectly and the way that the instructions said. not even a day with the tank overnight two of my goldfish passed away because they were swimming and the led light burned their fin. don’t get this product. it is all a scam.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great tank with lots of lighting, good hood
customer_reviews.text: Love the lighting options , lid closes nice and tight. I recommend this tank its small but very nice all the way around and comes with everything to get started except heater. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kara A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Functional and aesthetically pleasing. Easy to set up. Great lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Colin Buxton

customer_reviews.title: Light doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have the tank set up for a week and the light already doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: fickerd

customer_reviews.title: It's okay at best
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shape of this tank, but that's about it. The filter really isnt strong enough to support more than one fish without 2 weekly water changes. And I am also disappointed with the light. I have only had this tank since july and the light stopped working on it yesterday. It's part of the lid so I cant replace it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Dewhurst

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: THE AQUARIUM IS COOL BUT THE FILTER SUCKS... THE LIGHTS ARE COOL THAT CHANGE COLOR
customer_reviews.author: Ok Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this tank!
customer_reviews.text: It’s light weight, easy to set up, and pretty good quality for the price. I have one Black Orchid Beta in mine and it is a healthy amount of space for him. The lights have plenty of colors and settings. I intend to purchase another one for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tank, poor filter
customer_reviews.text: Great tank for my Betta! i love the timed lights feature and that they're are so many options for different colored lights. My only complaint is the filter that came with it is already on the fritz. I had to purchase a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: 3-4 inch crack! Unusable :(
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this 6.5 gallon tank, but when I got it there is a crack 3-4 inches long. There should be some protection around the other items that they put inside the fish tank, that's possibly how it broke. I think everything else is in working condition, but I can't fill up the tank and put my 3 girl bettas and albino Cory in it. Big dissappointment!!! :(
customer_reviews.author: Susanna I.

customer_reviews.title: Love the tank and lights not a fan of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the tank and lights not a fan of the filter could be a bit better , overall it’s nice
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: After just 10 days of having this tank I came home to a crack in the side and water all over my table and floor. Would have loved this tank if not for the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: First waz great. Second is cracked. 😒
customer_reviews.text: Ordered another because I loved the furst one so much. Showed up split all the way down one side. I love this tank. I needed something a bit bigger for my beta. It is very sturdy and easy to set up. The pump is perfect for the tank. Not to strong of a current that the fish have difficulty swimming. Wonderful size for decorations for live plants both in height and width. I have not have any problems with the led lights like other people have commented about. There are way too many settings. Im not sure a fish would really like blinking red, blue, green, yellow...lol. But the light is nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not get the right item don't buy from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Received a fish tank filter didn't even get the tank
customer_reviews.author: Alina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Tank is awesome. Filter is not.
customer_reviews.text: The fish tank itself is nice and roomy enough for a few fish. The filter that comes with the tank however is not very good. Mine has malfunctioned and has not kept the tank clean at all. The information on the filter is also wrong so I struggled to find the right replacement cartridge for the filter at any local pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filter only worked for first few weeks
customer_reviews.text: The filter constantly stops working...I am going through filters like crazy! My tank is constantly dirty. It sounds clogged so i even took it apart and cleaned out, less than 12 hours later it stopped working again. My poor fish seems stressed.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Hoffman

product_meta.title: Koller Products 6.5-Gallon Aquarium Kit with Power Filter and LED Lighting, (AP650)
product_meta.description: Koller Products AquaView 6-gallon 360 aquarium includes energy-efficient LED lighting with 7 color choices plus 4 transitioning and color combinations you can choose depending on the time of day or to enhance your viewing pleasure, along with internal power filter that will keep your aquarium water optimal and your fish healthy. This trendy aquarium is designed for easy set up and maintenance. Imagine watching beautiful tropical fish gently swimming back and forth, ideal for helping forget about stress in everyday life. People enjoy watching aquariums as they can be calming and relaxing, as well as a beautiful addition to any home or office. Gravel and decor sold separately. Have a question or need help, contact us at customercare@kollerproducts.com for fast, friendly service. Dimensions: 11" Dia x 19.8"H. Uses Koller Products replacement filter cartridges (AQ10FC-60), Amazon # B086ZM4PYG.
feature_bullets: Are you looking to buy an aquarium for your children? If you are, you are going to want to look at this fish tank. Owning an aquarium can be a really fun and rewarding experience and an ideal way to teach your child the responsibility of pet ownership.
Energy-efficient LED lighting with 7 dazzling color selections to brightly illuminate your fish, choose daylight white, blue, green, amber, aqua, purple, or red depending on time of day or your mood.

Internal power filter cleans and purifies aquarium water at a flow rate of 45 gallons per hour effectively removing organic pollutants including discoloration, odors, heavy metals, and toxic gases. Uses Koller Products replacement filter cartridges (B086ZM4PYG) available on Amazon.

Crystal-clear clarity so good that most think it's glass, manufactured of impact-resistant plastic providing leak-proof assurance, unlike glass tanks glued together with silicone, this one-piece tank puts to rest any worries or concerns about possible leaks.
This trendy aquarium is a W. Dimensions: 11 Dia x 19.8 H inches
